[I am Luisa, a Policy & Data Analyst, freelance consultant, and {{< fa brands r-project >}} enthusiast.]{style="color:  #7f6b00; font-weight: bold;"}

My professional focus lies at the intersection of *Economics*, *Public Policy* and *Statistics*. In over 20 years of experience (in Italy and in the US), I have worked on the entire analytic cycle (data collection-analysis-presentation) for several research projects within the fields of **economic development and the impact evaluation of public economic policies**.   

You can learn more about my background and publications via the [**research**](../writings) page, my [**CV**](../cv), or the links below.
